In Germany earlier this week, Eric Schmidt told a group of reporters at the Digital-Life-Design conference that he is committed to doing what he currently doing as long as it is exciting. He also said that as executive chairman, he will be dealing a lot with regulators and other government officials, as Google's sprawling presence continues to capture more attention from governments around the world. He says Paul Bremer 's decisions inadvertently stoked nationalist resentments and fanned the embers of what would become the Iraqi insurgency . Donald Rumsfeld had favoured going into Iraq quickly and getting out quickly, handing over power to the Iraqis, but Paul Bremer favoured a slower approach.
